acceptresourceshareinvitation.name: AcceptResourceShareInvitation
acceptresourceshareinvitation.description: Grants permission to accept the specified resource share invitation

associateresourceshare.name: AssociateResourceShare
associateresourceshare.description: Grants permission to associate resource(s) and/or principal(s) to a resource share

associateresourcesharepermission.name: AssociateResourceSharePermission
associateresourcesharepermission.description: Grants permission to associate a Permission with a Resource Share

createpermission.name: CreatePermission
createpermission.description: Grants permission to create a Permission that can be associated to a Resource Share

createpermissionversion.name: CreatePermissionVersion
createpermissionversion.description: Grants permission to create a new version of a Permission that can be associated to a Resource Share

createresourceshare.name: CreateResourceShare
createresourceshare.description: Grants permission to create a resource share with provided resource(s) and/or principal(s)

deletepermission.name: DeletePermission
deletepermission.description: Grants permission to delete a specified Permission

deletepermissionversion.name: DeletePermissionVersion
deletepermissionversion.description: Grants permission to delete a specified version of a permission

deleteresourceshare.name: DeleteResourceShare
deleteresourceshare.description: Grants permission to delete resource share

disassociateresourceshare.name: DisassociateResourceShare
disassociateresourceshare.description: Grants permission to disassociate resource(s) and/or principal(s) from a resource share

disassociateresourcesharepermission.name: DisassociateResourceSharePermission
disassociateresourcesharepermission.description: Grants permission to disassociate a Permission from a Resource Share

enablesharingwithawsorganization.name: EnableSharingWithAwsOrganization
enablesharingwithawsorganization.description: Grants permission to access customer's organization and create a SLR in the customer's account

getpermission.name: GetPermission
getpermission.description: Grants permission to get the contents of an AWS RAM permission

getresourcepolicies.name: GetResourcePolicies
getresourcepolicies.description: Grants permission to get the policies for the specified resources that you own and have shared

getresourceshareassociations.name: GetResourceShareAssociations
getresourceshareassociations.description: Grants permission to get a set of resource share associations from a provided list or with a specified status of the specified type

getresourceshareinvitations.name: GetResourceShareInvitations
getresourceshareinvitations.description: Grants permission to get resource share invitations by the specified invitation arn or those for the resource share

getresourceshares.name: GetResourceShares
getresourceshares.description: Grants permission to get a set of resource shares from a provided list or with a specified status

listpendinginvitationresources.name: ListPendingInvitationResources
listpendinginvitationresources.description: Grants permission to list the resources in a resource share that is shared with you but that the invitation is still pending for

listpermissionassociations.name: ListPermissionAssociations
listpermissionassociations.description: Grants permission to list information about the permission and any associations

listpermissionversions.name: ListPermissionVersions
listpermissionversions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of an AWS RAM permission

listpermissions.name: ListPermissions
listpermissions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS RAM permissions

listprincipals.name: ListPrincipals
listprincipals.description: Grants permission to list the principals that you have shared resources with or that have shared resources with you

listreplacepermissionassociationswork.name: ListReplacePermissionAssociationsWork
listreplacepermissionassociationswork.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of the asynchronous permission replacement

listresourcesharepermissions.name: ListResourceSharePermissions
listresourcesharepermissions.description: Grants permission to list the Permissions associated with a Resource Share

listresourcetypes.name: ListResourceTypes
listresourcetypes.description: Grants permission to list the shareable resource types supported by AWS RAM

listresources.name: ListResources
listresources.description: Grants permission to list the resources that you added to resource shares or the resources that are shared with you

promotepermissioncreatedfrompolicy.name: PromotePermissionCreatedFromPolicy
promotepermissioncreatedfrompolicy.description: Grants permission to create a separate, fully manageable customer managed permission

promoteresourcesharecreatedfrompolicy.name: PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy
promoteresourcesharecreatedfrompolicy.description: Grants permission to promote the specified resource share

rejectresourceshareinvitation.name: RejectResourceShareInvitation
rejectresourceshareinvitation.description: Grants permission to reject the specified resource share invitation

replacepermissionassociations.name: ReplacePermissionAssociations
replacepermissionassociations.description: Grants permission to update all resource shares to a new permission

setdefaultpermissionversion.name: SetDefaultPermissionVersion
setdefaultpermissionversion.description: Grants permission to specify a version number as the default version for the respective customer managed permission

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource share or permission

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource share or permission

updateresourceshare.name: UpdateResourceShare
updateresourceshare.description: Grants permission to update attributes of the resource share
